name: Tumbling
description: Asymmetric or inversion entry, perfect pitch movement

criterias.normal: energy on entry, timing, flow, trajectory (pitch movement), angle (180° for maximum score), exit or connection
criterias.twisted: twisted on the entry, must stay twisted, untwist at the exit NOT during the turns
criterias.devil twist: from a twisted situation, change of twist direction (within one turn)
criterias.hardcore entry: twisted on the speed taking, getting untwisted and twisted in the other direction while pulling the entry
criterias.cab slide: get twisted during an infinity tumbling turn

connection: Forbidden connection to Infinite and Anti-Rythmic
